titles.title: Metropolitan Statistical Area Stabilization Act
A bill to prohibit the Director of the Office of Management and Budget from raising the minimum urban area population to qualify a metropolitan statistical area from 50,000, and for other purposes.
Metropolitan Statistical Area Stabilization Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs. Hearings held.

bill.summary:
Metropolitan Statistical Area Stabilization Act
This bill prohibits the Office of Management and Budget from raising the minimum urban area population to qualify a metropolitan statistical area from 50,000.
